p: The experiment was carried out in the laboratory of the Ornamental Horticulture Dep., Fac. of Agric., Cairo Univ., Giza, Egypt., during the two successive seasons from 28 November 2018 to 3 January 2019. The study was performed to examine the influence of using some natural essential oils as preservative solutions on the vase life of chrysanthemum cut flowers and to improve their quality and to extend the shelf-life period. The Scanning electron microscopy was carried out in the National Research Centre (NRC).
